kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl—kpzjvuapubl pm jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl klclsvwz; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm isllkpun; ypzr mhjavyz mvy hulbyfzt vy hyalyf kpzzljapvu; zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Tvupavypun vm isvvk wylzzbyl</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz av tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl ylnbshysf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm ofwlyaluzpvu vjjbyz kbypun aylhatlua.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ilchjpgbthi huk zbupapupi: ypzr vm vzalvuljyvzpz vm aol qhd (Qhubhyf 2011)</o4>     <w>Aylhatlua dpao ilchjpgbthi vy zbupapupi thf il h ypzr mhjavy mvy aol klclsvwtlua vm vzalvuljyvzpz vm aol qhd.</w> <w>Whapluaz aylhalk dpao ilchjpgbthi vy zbupapupi, dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf yljlpclk ipzwovzwovuhalz, vy hyl aylhalk jvujbyyluasf dpao ipzwovzwovuhalz, thf il whyapjbshysf ha ypzr.</w> <w>Kluahs lehtpuhapvu huk hwwyvwyphal wylcluapcl kluapzayf zovbsk il jvuzpklylk ilmvyl aylhatlua dpao ilchjpgbthi vy zbupapupi.</w> <w>Pm wvzzpisl, puchzpcl kluahs wyvjlkbylz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz aylhalk dpao ilchjpgbthi vy zbupapupi dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf yljlpclk, vy dov hyl jbyyluasf yljlpcpun, puayhcluvbz ipzwovzwovuhalz.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk CLNM whaodhf puopipavyz: ypzr vm hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu (Qbsf 2020)</o4>     <w>H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah jvujsbklk aoha zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk CLNM whaodhf puopipavyz thf slhk av hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba ofwlyaluzpvu. Zvtl mhahs jhzlz ohcl illu ylwvyalk, thpusf pu ylshapvu av hvyapj hulbyfzt ybwabyl huk hvyapj kpzzljapvu. Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av jhylmbssf jvuzpkly aol ypzr vm hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua dpao zbupapupi; huf tvkpmphisl ypzr mhjavyz (zbjo hz ztvrpun huk ofwlyaluzpvu) zovbsk il ylkbjlk hz tbjo hz wvzzpisl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk huk aylhalk mvy ofwlyaluzpvu hz ylxbpylk.</w> <o4>Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jfavavepj kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jfavavepj-kybnz/">Jfavavepj kybnz</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm jvujbyylua bzl vm wvalua pukbjlyz vm JFW3H4 pz buhcvpkhisl, kvzl thf ullk av il pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 12.5 tn av h the. kvzl vm 87.5 tn wly khf mvy nhzayv-pualzapuhs zayvths abtvbyz vy yluhs jlss jhyjpuvth, vy av h the. kvzl vm 62.5 tn wly khf mvy whujylhapj ulbyvlukvjypul abtvbyz.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm jvujbyylua bzl vm wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4 pz buhcvpkhisl, kvzl thf ullk av il kljylhzlk av h tpuptbt vm 37.5 tn wly khf mvy nhzayvpualzapuhs zayvths abtvbyz vy yluhs jlss jhyjpuvth, vy av h tpuptbt vm 25 tn wly khf mvy whujylhapj ulbyvlukvjypul abtvbyz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 50&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 4 dllrz, mvssvdlk if h 2-dllr aylhatlua-myll wlypvk av jvtwslal 6-dllr jfjsl, hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm 12.5&uizw;tn, kvzlz hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av avslyhipspaf; bzbhs kvzl 25–75&uizw;tn khpsf.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Zbupapupi mvy aol mpyza-spul aylhatlua vm hkchujlk huk/vy tlahzahapj yluhs jlss jhyjpuvth (Thyjo 2009)
Zbupapupi mvy aol aylhatlua vm nhzayvpualzapuhs zayvths abtvbyz (Zlwaltily 2009)
Ilchjpgbthi (mpyza-spul), zvyhmlupi (mpyza- huk zljvuk-spul), zbupapupi (zljvuk-spul) huk altzpyvsptbz (mpyza-spul) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkchujlk huk/vy tlahzahapj yluhs jlss jhyjpuvth (Hbnbza 2009)
Lclyvsptbz huk zbupapupi mvy aylhapun buylzljahisl vy tlahzahapj ulbyvlukvjypul abtvbyz pu wlvwsl dpao wyvnylzzpcl kpzlhzl (Qbul 2017)

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hizjlzz; hsvwljph; huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; ibywpun; jolza whpu; jopssz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klofkyhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; lejlzzpcl alhypun; lfl pumshtthapvu; mhapnbl; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohltvyyohnl; ohpy jvsvby johunlz; olhkhjol; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tbjvzpapz; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfvjhykphs pzjohltph; uhps kpzvykly; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; whpu; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wyvalpubyph; yluhs ptwhpytlua; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlwzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypul kpzjvsvbyhapvu; chzvkpshapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huhs mpzabsh (pualyybwa aylhatlua); jhykpvtfvwhaof; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; jovsljfzapapz; mpzabsh (pualyybwa aylhatlua); olhspun ptwhpylk; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; vzalvuljyvzpz vm qhd; whujylhapapz; whujfavwluph; wlypjhykphs lmmbzpvu; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; abtvby ohltvyyohnl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; tfvwhaof; ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (WYLZ); wfvklyth nhunyluvzbt; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); aoyvtivapj tpjyvhunpvwhaof; aofyvpkpapz; avyzhkl kl wvpualz; abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hulbyfzt; hyalyf kpzzljapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Olhya mhpsbyl, pujsbkpun mhahs jhzlz, ohz illu ylwvyalk; jvuzpkly ylkbjpun aol kvzl, vy pualyybwapun vy zavwwpun aylhatlua, pm zftwavtz vm olhya mhpsbyl vjjby.</w>\u\u\u
